content: -------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------- **2x2** - by tin can knits -------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------- *a quick knit this big and bold button scarf is a perfect last-minute gift the extremely simple cable pattern also makes it a great first cable project * like our work sign up for our email updates 1 and we ll let you know about new designs 2 in-depth tutorials 3 and subscriber-only special offers -------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------- **pattern info** ============ **sizing ** finished cowl measures 23 long and 7 tall **materials ** 100 yds bulky weight yarn sample shown in sweet fiber merino big twist in sea glass **gauge ** 12 sts & 16 row per 4 in stockinette stitch **needles ** us #11 / 8 mm * or as required to meet gauge * **helpful tutorials ** how to cable 4 -------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------- for all pattern abbreviations techniques and to contact us visit www tincanknits com 5 1 http //eepurl com/k5p8l 2 http //tincanknits com/patterns html 3 http //tincanknits com/techniques html 4 http //blog tincanknits com/2009/08/01/how-to-cable/ 5 http //www tincanknits com
